tweet: 1/6 OpenLaw recently demoed an employment smart contract that could pay someone hourly in ETH. They demoed it so that it could use Chainlink to call the ETH price hourly so that you could, say, earn $20 an hour in the equivalent ETH.

1) Extremely active Github 2) Solid no-hype team about business 3) Elite business connections behind the scenes 4) Unlimited amount of use cases 5) Smart contracts are useless w/o it 6) Already has clients  That's why I'm invested in ChainLink $LINK #Bullish #Fundamentals  https://t.co/CC9oRtVIsK
